changeSet.author: nghurtch
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cohort_tag (cohort_tag_name, ddp_participant_id, ddp_instance_id) SELECT "OS", ddp_participant_id, (SELECT ddp_instance_id FROM ddp_instance where instance_name = "Osteo") FROM ddp_participant where ddp_instance_id = (SELECT ddp_instance_id FROM ddp_instance where instance_name = "Osteo");
